links.*: Map of Beleriand and the Lands to the North
Of Tuor and his Coming to Gondolin

wikitext.*:
The river '''Ginglith''' was a river of [[Beleriand]] and a tributary to [[Narog]].<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref>

The Ginglith had its wells in the [[Woods of Núath]], under the near the [[Ered Wethrin]] in northern [[West Beleriand]].<ref>{{UT|Tuor}}, note 14</ref> After passing by the lands of Tumhalad it met the Narog about 50 miles north of [[Nargothrond]].
